channel.title: [PI]Report Abuse System
channel.description:
Just added a Report Abuse system, and everything works great, except for when it saves the text the player says it comes out like this: [code=java] fucker was reported by kryptex, Offensive language, March, 22 -[10:11:32: fucker]: a s dee s a dee s a dee s d aee s dee s d aee s a dee d -[10:11:34: fucker]: a dee a s dee s dee s a dee -[10:11:36: fucker]: ee u -h e o u eo i -[10:11:38: fucker]: eo oe eo i [/code]
When it should be real words.
Any idea what would cause this?

item.title: [PI]Report Abuse System

item.title: [PI]Report Abuse System
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Just added a Report Abuse system, and everything works great, except for when it saves the text the player says it comes out like this:

fucker was reported by kryptex, Offensive language, March, 22
 -[10:11:32: fucker]:  a s dee s a dee s a dee s d aee s dee s d aee s a dee d
 -[10:11:34: fucker]:  a dee a s dee s dee s a dee
 -[10:11:36: fucker]: ee u -h  e  o u  eo i 
 -[10:11:38: fucker]: eo oe   eo i

When it should be real words.

Any idea what would cause this?

Read full topic
